overview: Metallica at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 19, 2013. Setlist:  1 - The Ecstasy of Gold (Ennio Morricone song)  2 - Hit the Lights  3 - Master of Puppets  4 - Holier Than Thou  5 - Harvester of Sorrow  6 - The Day that Never Comes  7 - The Memory Remains  8 - Wherever I May Roam  9 - Welcome Home (Sanitarium)  10 - Sad but True  11 - ...And Justice for All  12 - One  13 - For Whom the Bell Tolls  14 - Blackened  15 - Nothing Else Matters  16 - Enter Sandman  Encore:  17 - Creeping Death  18 - Battery (Without Intro)  19 - Seek & Destroy (with "The Frayed Ends of Sanity" outro jam)
title: Metallica: Rock In Rio 2013
